Articles.Content:
I was just thinking as a roleplay aspect to add parts that do the exact same thing as the stock parts but look like aliens made them (You know, Tentacles, Green/purple color, Pure scaryness,)

I can just imagine building a alien battleship and facing it off against a kerbal ship using bd armory

I've been plotting incorporating alien tech into my Koins! concept. It would send you on contracts that are basically treasure hunts. In addition to grabbing coins like in a platform-jumping game, some would lead to alien artifacts which would open secret tech nodes when discovered.

I just have no clue how to actually make the thing.

Edited February 17, 2015 by ultrasquid
link added
